bibl.title: Carian Mercenaries at Naukratis? Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: The British Museum Research Publication No.

bibl.title: Naukratis: Greek Diversity in Egypt. Studies on East Greek Pottery and Exchange in the Eastern Mediterranean
bibl.author: WILLIAMS, Dyfri

bibl.note: Two fragments of pottery from Naukratis in the British Museum (Inv. GR 1888.6-1.653; GR 1924.12-1.37) identified as probable products of Caria.
WILLIAMS Dyfri and Alexandra VILLING, Carian Mercenaries at Naukratis? Avec résumé en anglais.

Alexandra VILLING and Udo SCHLOTZHAUER (Edd.), Naukratis: Greek Diversity in Egypt. Studies on East Greek Pottery and Exchange in the Eastern Mediterranean = The British Museum Research Publication No. 162 (London, 2006) pp. 47-48, 3 figg.
